=====================
Pynquino
=====================


.. toctree::

Introduction
=====================

---------------------
Synoposis
---------------------

1) PYNQ project integrated Linux operating system, micro controller for real time control, and fast computation for FPGA 
2) PYNQ does not provide Arduino integration in terms of Software
3) PYNQ enables users to develop with Python and Jupyter notebook , however, still a challenge for non-programmer to customize the code

---------------------
Objective
---------------------
1) Integrate different types of robot and sensors 
2) Accelerate computer vision and machine learning 

---------------------
Content
---------------------
Pynquino projects provides following softwares:

1) Pynquino compiler for porting Arduino code to PYNQ-Microblaze automatically.
2) Blockly editor as wrapper environment of Jupyter notebook for easy programming.
